name: BeetleQuest!
description:
Beetlequest is an adventure\point & click game inspired by older games like King's Quest and Legends of Kyrandia. It is based on a children's books and fairytales, and for all ages!

Story

In BeetleQuest, the three beetle friends, Magnus, Boris and Dagmar are playing with their marbles, when Boris accidentially shoots his marble into a molehill!

The mole inside is very angry, and has a large bump on his head. He refuses to give back the marble, as this isn't the first time this has happened. And only in exchange for a nice present will the mole give the marble back.

And so, their quest begins! To find a nice present for the little mole, and get back their precious marble!

Reading

One of our aims with the game is to to stimulate the reading skills of younger players, if we can!

In the Netherlands, (where we are from) reading skills are generally on the decline, and therefore, we have made the game also in Dutch.
